post.title: Celebrate St. Patrick's Day With CSGORoll!
post.excerpt: This St. Patrick's Day, clear your plans. We're hosting a Jackpot giveaway, with extra special boxes, double beers and plenty more! On Thursday 17th March, celebrate St. Patrick's Day with CSGORoll ! There's lots of themed content to enjoy, and a who
post.content_html:
This St. Patrick's Day, clear your plans. We're hosting a Jackpot giveaway, with extra special boxes, double beers and plenty more!

On Thursday 17th March, celebrate St. Patrick's Day with CSGORoll ! There's lots of themed content to enjoy, and a whole host of opportunities to win.

Your Own Pot Of Gold

All day, you can wave goodbye to our usual 5% bonus. Instead, enjoy a 7.5% bonus on top of your deposits up to a $1,000 bonus on your daily deposits! Before you know it, you'll have built your very own pot of gold. But you'll need to watch out for leprechauns...

This bonus will activate on Wednesday 16th March at 23:59 UTC. It's limited to one day, so make sure you don't miss out.

Double beers

For our chat giveaways, we'll drop twice as many beers as usual. And that's not all. For every game you play, you'll also be rewarded with double the beers!

Double beers will activate on Wednesday 16th March at 23:59 UTC, for one day only.

St. Patrickâ€™s Day Boxes

Keep an eye out for our special St Patrick's Day boxes! They'll release exclusively for this event, packed with tickets for our Jackpot giveaway that will be collected as you open it.

St Patrick's Day boxes will activate on Tuesday 15th March at 20:00 UTC.

Jack"Pot" Of Gold

If that wasn't enough, this should be... When you open our St Patrick's Day boxes, you'll collect Jackpot tickets for our 30K giveaway! Split between 50 winners, our Jackpot will commence on Tuesday 15th March at 20:00 UTC.

We'll even award the top ten beer holders of the event! If you're in the top three, you'll receive 13000, 7000, and 3000 coins, respectively. For the remaining top seven, you'll each receive 1000 coins.

The winners will be awarded in a livestream hosted on CSGORoll , on Thursday 17th March at 19:00 UTC. If you've got plans, cancel them! Grab your lucky charms, and meet us there.

Will a pot of gold come your way this St Patrick's Day? There's only one way to find out...
